channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The issue is located outside the Sainsbury’s Express shop on Beckenham Road. Could you please look into this matter, as it poses a health concern? Kindly request the management team to address this issue as soon as possible., 21st November
item.description:
I’m writing to raise a concern about the Sainsbury’s Express shop located on Beckenham Road. The area outside the store consistently appears untidy, with litter scattered around on a regular basis. Given that this is a food retail outlet, the lack of cleanliness raises potential health and hygiene issues that I believe warrant urgent attention. I kindly ask if you could speak with the store management or take appropriate action to ensure the area is maintained to a suitable standard. A cleaner and more presentable environment would benefit both the community and the store’s reputation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked and soft verge severely damaged, 21st November
item.description:
The pavement outside 13 Ryecroft has been blocked to pedestrian for 2 weeks by barriers. The soft grass verge has also been driven over by a heavy goods vehicle resulting in severe damage to the verge and evidence of some disturbance to the adjacent paving slabs. Muck from the soft verge is frequently found on the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ryecroft Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Overflow of eBikes and scooters, 21st November
item.description:
There are far too many electric bikes and scooters being parked in this area. They spill out of the designated bike/scooter parking area and frequently end up on the pavement. This is blocking the pavement and taking up limited parking spaces. It is like this daily.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Bicknell Road, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No bins taken on canal walk this week, 21st November
item.description:
No bins were taken from canal walk this week. Rubbish has now been left out for days and is falling all over the street. Some recycling bins were also not taken.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Meadowcourt Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet
